com.qtplaf.library.database

Class Criteria.Segment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.Criteria.Segment
  • Enclosing class:
    Criteria

    public static class Criteria.Segment
extends java.lang.Object
    A criteria segment is a list of conditions related with an operator, either OR or AND.
